HERB000450	BIAN DOU	扁豆	Niger Bean	Lablab niger	Mild; Sweet	Spleen; Stomach	Dolichos lablab L.	1. Treatment of deficient spleen not transforming and transporting water manifested as lassitude, poor appetite, loose stool or diarrhea, or leukorrhea due to downward flowing of turbid dampness. Hyacinth bean (Biandou) is used with Ginseng (Renshen), White atractylodes (Baizhu) and Poria (Fuling) in the formula Shen Ling Baizhu San. 2.
